CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller_Account__c)), "Reseller", IF( Public_Sector_VG_Count__c > 0, CASE( Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly", "PS Quarterly", "Direct Monthly", "PS Monthly", "Direct Annual", "PS Annual", "Upfront Payments", "PS Upfront", "Direct Semi-Annual", "PS Semi Annual", "" ), IF( Show_All_Order_Forms__c = TRUE, CASE( Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly", "NA, MX, EMEA Quarterly", "Direct Monthly", "NA, MX, EMEA Monthly", "Direct Annual", "NA, MX, EMEA Annual", "Upfront Payments", "NA, MX, EMEA Upfront", "Direct Semi-Annual", "NA, MX, EMEA Semi Annual", "" ), IF( Region_US_Canada__c = TRUE, CASE( Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly", "NA", "Direct Monthly", "NA", "Direct Annual", "NA", "Upfront Payments", "NA", "Direct Semi-Annual", "NA", "" ), IF( Region_Mexico__c = TRUE, CASE( Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly", "MX", "Direct Monthly", "MX", "Direct Annual", "MX", "Upfront Payments", "MX", "Direct Semi-Annual", "MX", "" ), IF( Region_EMEA__c = TRUE, CASE( Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly", "EMEA Quarterly", "Direct Monthly", "EMEA Monthly", "Direct Annual", "EMEA Annual", "Upfront Payments", "EMEA Upfront", "Direct Semi-Annual", "EMEA Semi Annual", "" ), CASE( Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly", "CPQ Quarterly", "Direct Monthly", "CPQ Monthly", "Direct Annual", "CPQ Annual", "Upfront Payments", "CPQ Upfront", "Direct Semi-Annual", "CPQ Semi Annual", "" ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Conga Template Availability
